alert.note: Alert for Converse; Goshen; Niobrara; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 2:55PM MDT until June 29 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northwestern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Northeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... Southeastern Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 254 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glendo, or 26 miles southeast of Douglas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glendo and Rawhide Buttes. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 112 and 118. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming.
